alert.note: Alert for Cloud; Republic; Washington (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 9:54PM CDT until August 10 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Republic County in north central Kansas... Southwestern Washington County in north central Kansas... Eastern Cloud County in north central Kansas... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 954 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles north of Concordia, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Concordia, Clyde, Agenda and Aurora. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
